Articles.Content:
Getting frustrated at your rockets going boom or crashing into the Mun. Take a break and see if you can make up your own funny Kerbal story.

Here's a couple of mine. Excuse the FPS I wish I had a better computer. I'm also new to video making having previously done it with a webcam recording my tv (very poor quality). I've now downloaded the free version of fraps which is really easy to use so just mucking around so i can learn to help my daughter out with some minecraft videos. I'm interested to see what other story lines people can come up with.

Jeb's Test Lab

http://youtu.be/EKFYTQ43q5Y

EVA
